start.text: Let's go. Let's wrap this up quickly.

start_boss.text: An over glorified trash is still trash.
Fascinating... I wonder how bright they will burn.

retreat.text: Ah, I get to go home first... lucky me.

out_of_missiles.text: Missile ordnance empty? Shame, I could use more.
Missile racks are now empty. Sad, I want to bury them with it.

engaged.text: Poor thing... is there any point in doing this?
Surely you long for the repose of death?
Be dyed in black, and quickly rot in obscurity.
Is there any meaning to that life of yours?

pursuing.text: Worry not, your suffering will be over.
Running away is futile. It is your fate to perish here.
Run... if you can, that is..

running.text: I've no intention of stopping here.

hull_90.text: So I have erred in my calculations...

hull_50.text: The hull has sustained considerable damage.
I wonder if I can still draw out more efficiency...

hull_30.text: Huh... there's just too much irregularity...

overload.text: Oh my, this is quite troublesome.

death.text: Failure is our privilege, just as it is yours to be sad.
Ah, the sweet release of death. I wonder what lies beyond...
This is it for me, captain. Don't follow me too soon.

victory.text: Tactics as beautiful and refreshing as the guillotine.
Mission over. The crushed dreams of the powerless. Pitiful, isn't it?
It's finally over. If just for a little longer, please allow me to be by your side.
